head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BUCKHOUT, F. CLAY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BUCKHOUT, F. CLAY

block.p: BUCKHOUT-F. Clay. On May 3, at Lexington, MA. Beloved husband of the late Martha Morgan; father of Anne Chase, of Wayland, MA, and Constance Poillon, of Cos Cob, CT. Also survived by nine grandchildren and fourteen great-grandchildren. Mass of Christian Burial on Saturday, May 6 at 11AM at St. Francis Chapel, Gate of Heaven Cemetery, Hawthorne, NY.
